cast.name: 克里斯托弗·约纳尔 Kristoffer Joner
埃米尔·约翰森 Emil Johnsen
马格努斯·克雷佩 Magnus Krepper

introduction: Ten years after their breakup, Sarah agrees to visit bestselling author David at his cabin on the Norwegian coast and help with his latest opus, a raw and graphic play exploring their years as a couple. Four pairs of fantastic Scandinavian actors portray Sarah and David at various ages in this play-within-a-movie, framing a uniquely theatrical four acts. Though Sarah is now married to another man, old feelings linger and spark. Sarah and David’s is a love story for the ages—full of passion, discontent, sensual pleasure and regret.
